description: A hwPimNeighborLoss notification signifies the loss of an
adjacency with a neighbor. This notification should be
generated when the neighbor is lost.
This notification is generated whenever the counter
hwPimNeighborLossCount is incremented, subject
to the rate limit specified by
hwPimNeighborLossNotificationPeriod.
REFERENCE RFC 4601 section 4.3.2

event.Summary: PIM neighbor lost due to $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborLoss HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborUpTime t 31536000 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborIfName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID u 9999 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborNotificationReason i 1

description: The time since this PIM neighbor (last) became a neighbor
of the local router.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborUpTime

description: The name for the interface used to reach this
PIM neighbor.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborIfName

description: The Instance ID of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID

description: The instance name of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName

description: The reason for trap sending:
1:holdTime expired;
2:Not receive hello for a long time;
3:Interface is down;
4:Receive Hello again;
5:neighbour is deleted;
6:Alarm time out;
7:Receive Hello HoldTime is Zero;
8:Bfd Session is Down;
9:User Operation;
100:Alarm Clear
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborNotificationReason

description: A hwPimInvalidRegister notification signifies that an invalid
PIM Register message was received by this device.
This notification is generated whenever the counter
hwPimInvalidRegisterMsgsRcvd is incremented, subject to the
rate limit specified by
hwPimInvalidRegisterNotificationPeriod.
REFERENCE RFC 4601 section 4.4.2

event.Summary: Invalid PIM register message received

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidRegister HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimGroupMappingPimMode i 1 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidRegisterAddressType i 0 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidRegisterOrigin s EXAM HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidRegisterGroup s EXAM HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidRegisterRp s EXAM HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID u 9999 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName s EXAMPLE

description: The PIM mode to be used for groups in this group prefix.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimGroupMappingPimMode

description: The address type stored in hwPimInvalidRegisterOrigin
hwPimInvalidRegisterGroup and hwPimInvalidRegisterRp.
If no unexpected Register messages have been received, then
this object is set to unknown(0).
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidRegisterAddressType

description: The source address of the last unexpected Register message
received by this device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidRegisterOrigin

description: The IP multicast group address to which the last unexpected
Register message received by this device was addressed.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidRegisterGroup

description: The RP address to which the last unexpected Register
message received by this device was delivered.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidRegisterRp

description: The Instance ID of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID

description: The instance name of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName

description: A hwPimInvalidJoinPrune notification signifies that an
invalid PIM Join/Prune message was received by this device.
This notification is generated whenever the counter
hwPimInvalidJoinPruneMsgsRcvd is incremented, subject to the
rate limit specified by
hwPimInvalidJoinPruneNotificationPeriod.
REFERENCE RFC 4601 section 4.5.2

event.Summary: Invalid PIM join/prune message received

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidJoinPrune HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimGroupMappingPimMode i 1 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidJoinPruneAddressType i 0 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidJoinPruneOrigin s EXAM HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidJoinPruneGroup s EXAM HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidJoinPruneRp s EXAM HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborUpTime t 31536000 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborIfName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID u 9999 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName s EXAMPLE

description: The PIM mode to be used for groups in this group prefix.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimGroupMappingPimMode

description: The address type stored in hwPimInvalidJoinPruneOrigin
hwPimInvalidJoinPruneGroup and hwPimInvalidJoinPruneRp.
If no unexpected Join/Prune messages have been received
this object is set to unknown(0).
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInvalidJoinPruneAddressType

message received by this device.

description: The IP multicast group address carried in the last
unexpected Join/Prune message received by this device.

description: The RP address carried in the last unexpected Join/Prune

of the local router.

PIM neighbor.

description: The Instance ID of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID

description: The instance name of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName

description: A hwPimRpMappingChange notification signifies a change to the
active RP mapping on this device.
This notification is generated whenever the counter
hwPimRpMappingChangeCount is incremented, subject to the
rate limit specified by
pimRPMappingChangeNotificationPeriod.

event.Summary: Active PIM RP mapping changed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimRpMappingChange HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimGroupMappingPimMode i 1 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimGroupMappingPrecedence u 9999 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID u 9999 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName s EXAMPLE

description: The PIM mode to be used for groups in this group prefix.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimGroupMappingPimMode

description: The precedence of this row, used in the algorithm that
determines which row applies to a given group address
(described above). Numerically higher values for this
object indicate lower precedences, with the value zero
denoting the highest precedence.
The absolute values of this object have a significance only
on the local router and do not need to be coordinated with
other routers.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimGroupMappingPrecedence

description: The Instance ID of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID

description: The instance name of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName

description: A hwPimInterfaceElection notification signifies that a new DR
or DF has been elected on a network.
This notification is generated whenever the counter
hwPimInterfaceElectionWinCount is incremented, subject to the
rate limit specified by
hwPimInterfaceElectionNotificationPeriod.
REFERENCE RFC 4601 section 4.3.2 and
I-D.ietf-pim-bidir section 3.5.2

event.Summary: New DR or DF is elected on network

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInterfaceElection HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInterfaceAddressType i 0 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInterfaceAddress s EXAM HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInterfaceName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID u 9999 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName s EXAMPLE

description: The address type of this PIM interface.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInterfaceAddressType

description: The primary IP address of this router on this PIM
interface. The InetAddressType is given by the
hwPimInterfaceAddressType object.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInterfaceAddress

description: The name of this PIM interface.

variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID

description: The instance name of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName

description: A hwPimNeighborAdd notification signifies the new neighbor.
This notification should be generated when receiving the hello
report of a new neighbor.
This notification is generated whenever the counter
hwPimNeighborAddCount is incremented, subject
to the rate limit specified by
hwPimNeighborAddNotificationPeriod.
REFERENCE RFC 4601 section 4.3.1

event.Summary: PIM neighbor added

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborAdd HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimNeighborExpiryTime t 31536000 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceID u 9999 HUAWEI-PIM-STD-MIB::hwPimInstanceName s EXAMPLE

description: A hwPimGlobalTypeSGExceed notification signifies that PIM specified type entries count of all instances reached the limit.

event.Summary: PIM global type SG exceeded
